title: Lag when watching my game in replay
body:
When i watch my game in replay i lag alot specially when i start recording.
 why is that?

replies.body: That lag while recording might be coming from your pc doing so much at once. Do you lag during the games at all? If not, let's try a clean boot really quick to see if you still lag during replays without any background programs running.
it still lags, even though i dont have anything open except for league
